alert.note: Alert for Saginaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 10:47AM EDT until March 26 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Michigan... Cass River At Frankenmuth affecting Saginaw County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cass River At Frankenmuth. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM EDT Friday the stage was 17.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.0 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - Impact...At 17.0 feet, the river begins to overflow its banks in places, flooding adjacent low lands. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
